downloadTitle: Office Communicator Web Access: Microsoft Office Communicator Web Access Lab Quick Start
downloadDescription: This guide describes the steps necessary to deploy Communicator Web Access in a lab environment.
detailsSection:
This guide describes the steps necessary to deploy Communicator Web Access in a lab environment in a single-forest, single-domain topology.
This guide contains the following sections:

  • Lab Scenario Overview: Describes the features that are demonstrated in each of the two lab scenarios.

  • Lab Scenario 1: Explains the requirements and installation steps for deploying Communicator Web Access for internal client access.

  • Lab Scenario 2: Explains the requirements and installation steps for deploying Communicator Web Access for remote client access.
systemRequirementsSection:
• This download works with the following Office applications:
    • Microsoft Office Word 2003
    • Microsoft Word 2002
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:
  1. Download the file by clicking the Download button (above) and saving the file to your hard disk.
  2. Double-click the CommunicatorWebAccess_QuickStart.doc to open the document.
To remove this download:

To remove the download file, delete the file CommunicatorWebAccess_QuickStart.doc.
